Hotlink Postpaid App is a self-serve app where you can manage your Hotlink Postpaid anytime, anywhere!

If you have signed up for Hotlink Postpaid & Fibre, please use MyMaxis App to manage your account.

• Manage your account details (account name, billing address and more)
• Choose your unlimited Internet plans from social, chat & music
• Track your data usage
• Download & pay your bills via Maxis Pay
• Enjoy the latest promotions and deals in town

To access & manage your account information, just use your mobile number.

creator: Maxis Broadband Sdn. Bhd.
descriptionHtml:
We are aware that some users may be experiencing problems logging in. Please report issues by calling 123 from your Hotlink mobile, or 1800821123 from other phones.

Hotlink Postpaid App is a self-serve app where you can manage your Hotlink Postpaid anytime, anywhere!

If you have signed up for Hotlink Postpaid & Fibre, please use MyMaxis App to manage your account.

Key Features:
• Manage your account details (account name, billing address and more)
• Choose your unlimited Internet plans from social, chat & music
• Track your data usage
• Download & pay your bills via Maxis Pay
• Enjoy the latest promotions and deals in town

To access & manage your account information, just use your mobile number.
descriptionShort: MANAGE ALL YOUR HOTLINK POSTPAID IN ONE APP.
